documents.document: @_thecatsays_ Mitzi says "Meow" back and I say "hello" 🐱 😊
@AtlasSaunders It really is xx
@AtlasSaunders That's stunning!
@Mitzarolly @Lickrish_mancat Thank you so much for the RT ❤️
@Mitzarolly @GingieSalem Thanks so much for the RT. This charity is very dear to my heart and I wish more people supported it. ❤️
Please support this charity - so many animals whose suffering is hidden from view in medical laboratories. Let's fi… https://t.co/e5V4d1p0ft
@MNashCatRescue That's great to hear! xx
@MNashCatRescue So beautiful and handsome!
@MNashCatRescue That's wonderful news. I'm so happy for him xx
@Lisuccen @rotrujo @888TomyBella @3coolkatz @babycatnfriends @MoetBlindCat He really is!
A new Twitter pal with a magnificent floofy tail! Please say hello to Boo, lovely folks 😀 https://t.co/6YeaIPyEYx
@LesterMcNumplet *sigh* Does Hooman know anything??! It's part of your job as a cat to get as high up as you can.
@SadOldBint @WallyNSnuffles Well said Anna!
@MoetBlindCat Oh dear, Moet, what's the matter? xxx
@AndyMeanie @SadOldBint Then it definitely doesn't count. Toblerone will be made secure until further notice 😐
@SadOldBint @MeanderingNumps @AndyMeanie We await Numps' and Lester's decision.
@SadOldBint @MeanderingNumps @AndyMeanie That's fair ☺
@AndrewGrahamDix @arthistorynews @BBC Is this going to be available on iPlayer? Unfortunately, we missed the first programme.
@Mitzarolly @SadOldBint @AndyMeanie @MeanderingNumps So Numps, what is the status of your ham supply now? Please report.
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie It's my tea time but I will check later! 🍖
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie Absolutely. And we will check with them later!
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie Sorry Andy, nothing less than a full reinstatement of Numps's ham supply will be accepted.
@AndyMeanie @SadOldBint Shall we allow Andy 2 pieces of Toblerone in return for that poem?
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie You mean it's been well licked by Numps and Lester :)
@AndyMeanie @SadOldBint All you have to do is reinstate Numps's ham supply IN FULL and the Toblerone kindly supplied by Anna will be yours.
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie That's what I think too. *Toblerone confiscated indefinitely*.
@ToastieBarks @HoCpetitions Signed this morning, Toastie. I like your style!
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie He said he had to buy a new snow shovel so Numps's ham supply had to be reduced to pay for it!!
@Mitzarolly @SadOldBint @AndyMeanie *quickly grabs giant Toblerone back from Andy*
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie D'oh! I was going to use that as a bargaining chip for Numps's ham supply :(
@AndyMeanie @SadOldBint Restore Numps's ham supply and we might send you some!
@LesterMcNumplet @SadOldBint If you must accompany Hooman to the toilet, at least wear a protective mask in future.
@MeanderingNumps That's outrageous. Tell Hooman to use his hands!
@TheTalkingDaxie I'm now following you on Instagram :)
Welcome to Twitter, Thomas. You're going to be fine and meet some lovely new pals #ZSHQ https://t.co/cHNKr9jF28
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie Andy definitely has the right idea.
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie Agreed, but cheese and chocolate would make it perfect!
Please sign and RT this petition - another 15,000 signatures are needed to get it debated in parliament. Thank you. https://t.co/qdTrZIuV7g
@SadOldBint @LesterMcNumplet 😂😂And he's so young and impressionable!
@cox_tom I so enjoyed this from start to finish. It's great to have you back on the radio. Thank you!
@SadOldBint @LesterMcNumplet Yes, although judging from your expression, Lester, I'm concerned you may be suffering psychological damage 😂
Please support this initiative too. https://t.co/vldF6pP4yL
Great selfie from my very handsome pal and proud member of @ZombieSquadHQ Nemo. https://t.co/qZLgCbE8ol
@harrythecav I'm so sorry 😢
@BraveWinston @Vimeo I love this! Made me smile all the way through. You guys are the best 😄 Happy Sunday xxxx
Please RT this everyone. Thank you. https://t.co/6Ephn6seQq
@andtheHare Hello, I've just ordered a mouse. 😊
@PeterAskin1 @WhickyWuudler Poor Lucian. Our Holly lost all her teeth but still tucked into food (incl. dry food) with great vigour.
@NeuroNemo What a gorgeous boy you are, Nemo. Great selfie 💖😊
@JoolsAWilson Who is this cutie?
@andtheHare Hello. Is it possible to order the mouse on the right with that darker scarf? 😊
Check it out! I donated to Help Transport Pets off Death Row https://t.co/SzJkbyeyI8 via @gofundme
@JaxandJoie A very Happy 2nd Birthday Jax! Mitzi sends you loud purrs 🐱 and I send a hug and 🎂 xxx

@MillieMall That's great!
@JRZnDEW I see it now! It's lovely to see such a strong friendship between a dog and a cat 😊
@JRZnDEW Phew! His head seemed to be mostly inside Jersey's mouth!
@MillieMall A very Happy Birthday from Mitzi and Amanda 🎂xxx
@sonyshihtzu63 Hi Sony! Hope you have a great week 😊
@NeuroNemo So handsome, Nemo. One of your best photos 😍
She is gorgeous! https://t.co/7B6gFON9PH
@JoolsAWilson That's very good advice. Have a peaceful night x
What a sweetheart! https://t.co/Zr3kYmVSlK
@JoolsAWilson How lovely they all are!
@cox_tom @SoundartRadio PS. Your waffling is also pretty excellent!
@filzballjaeger They have a very good website: https://t.co/F0AIBCrcsy Thanks for the RT xx
BBC News - The English vet saving Sri Lanka’s street dogs https://t.co/Ia5boFySPP
Do listen in or catch up on icloud. Tom does a great radio show. https://t.co/jhDyTutpJP
@cox_tom @SoundartRadio That's great news. I've missed your radio show and the excellent music you play, most of which is new to me.
Please RT. https://t.co/YsUgHZq6yu
@MNashCatRescue Thanks. I'll have to think a little longer on it and consult my husband. Might be a bit of a shock for our 20 year old cat?
@MNashCatRescue Can he live with other cats?
This is urgent - please can anyone help? https://t.co/XPqxgQ0o9a
@MNashCatRescue How long has Buzz been with you?
Please share this with South Devon followers. Thank you. https://t.co/j7lCNG1NJb
@AndyMeanie @Dougal_the_Lab Why is Twitter offering to translate this from Haitian Creole? 😂
Don't Let Trump Kill the Endangered Species Act https://t.co/hgsS3J1UxD
@WelshFelix Will he ever grow up?!
Please don't forget about these animals whose suffering is hidden from our sight. Please donate to find better ways… https://t.co/1wZXGQN0Yv
@Bunglepants_ @SadOldBint She's really pretty and they look very sweet together.
@SadOldBint @AndyMeanie Oh dear, that sounds difficult! Will you keep him and keep them apart?
@AndyMeanie @SadOldBint That's a good point. Holly was wary of Mitzi and Zara at first.
@SadOldBint Oh no! What are you going to do?
@SadOldBint How is Fos settling in? Are he and Smurfs making friends yet?
@HaloGreyhound A very Happy Birthday from Mitzi and me. 😀
@SadOldBint Do you add tomato, pickle or anything to it?
@SadOldBint 😀I'm trying to cut down (don't block me!) but I do love it.
@SadOldBint I hope you've got plenty of cheese in!
@helpcat_ I'm so sorry for you and Lilly.
@MeanderingNumps You didn't look too impressed to see him.
@SmallsLites Would it help if Tom loaned you Shipley to have a word with them?
Please RT this - and let cat owners in the Romford RM8 area know about it. https://t.co/KyzMqwJ1VN
I salute all penguins on #penguinawarenessday You are awesome (especially the ones who live in Antarctica).
@JaxandJoie Looking at you in this photo, I can see exactly how! 😍
And a very happy #NationalCheeseLoversDay Anna @SadOldBint 😁 https://t.co/JmdE6jvv0i
@mycharlibrown I love your tweets Charli-brown. You're a wonderful dog xxx
@AndyMeanie I bet they keep you fit! Do they sleep much? Do the cats sleep more?
@WallyNSnuffles Still almost a youngster too! No wonder you both have so much energy. How does poor old Hooman keep up with you?! 😁
@WallyNSnuffles Aaww, you're a youngster! Roughly how old is Wally?
@WallyNSnuffles How old were you Snuffles?
